name: Park Ranger Bois
description:
Become the best (or worst) park ranger the world has ever seen!

Go about the daily routine of a park ranger. Look after your forest and its wildlife as much as you can before sunset in order to get a park score. 

Tasks:

  • fix up the ranger car.
  • help animals.
  • ask trespassers and hunter to leave.
  • remove trash.
  • put out camp fires.
  • help lost tourists.
  • keep tourists out of the water.
  • do mad drifts in your car boi.

Notes

  • This is a concept demo
  • Play in windows mode.
  • You will encounter bugs enjoy :).
  • (Don't talk to bears or trees)

Background

I made this little game to demo a concept idea that I had. I just want to see if there is any interest in this type of game.

My time is limited at the moment hense why i only made a demo but if you like it or the concept feel free to let me know and I'll be sure to greatly improve it and make a full game when I find more time  :)

If you guys don't like it, i guess it'll just die here xD.
